column14: desc
Next round, +1 option to all choices for your new Pokemon.
Next round, +2 options to all choices for your new Pokemon.
Next round, +1 option to all choices for your new Pokemon, but your new Pokemon is 1 level lower than usual.
Next round, -1 option to all choices for your new Pokemon, but your new Pokemon is 3 levels higher than usual.
Next round, your new Pokemon knows the move *Moonlight* in an extra move slot.
Next round, your new Pokemon knows the moves *Rest* and *Sleep Talk* in extra move slots.
Next round, your new Pokemon knows the move *Return* in an extra move slot.
Next round, your new Pokemon knows the move *Attract* in an extra move slot. You will be able to choose its gender.
Next round, your new Pokemon has *Beast Boost* instead of its regular ability. Keep in mind you can hover over Atk and SpA to see unadjusted values.
Next round, your new Pokemon can get an ability it doesn't normally have, and moves it can't normally learn.
Next round, you can choose a Pokemon of any species YOU already own (you will then be able to choose any ability that species can have).
Next round, you can choose a Pokemon of any species YOUR OPPONENT owns (you will then be able to choose any ability that species can have).
Next round, you can choose a Pokemon of ANY species (you will then be able to choose any ability that species can have).
Automatically sets your Poke Ball for the next round to a random one (other than the default).

A Pokemon gains an extra move slot (add a hyphen on a new line).
EVERY Pokemon gains an extra move slot (add a hyphen on a new line).
A Pokemon loses a move slot (delete a hyphen).
Delete 1 or more moves from 1 or more Pokemon (leave the hyphens) (a Pokemon with no moves learns *Struggle*). Give yourself $1 for each move you delete.
A Pokemon forgets 2 moves (leave the hyphens) (a Pokemon with no moves learns *Struggle*) (can't be used if it has <2 moves).
A Pokemon forgets 3 moves (leave the hyphens) (a Pokemon with no moves learns *Struggle*) (can't be used if it has <3 moves).
EVERY Pokemon forgets 1 move (leave the hyphens) (a Pokemon with no moves learns *Struggle*).
A Pokemon forgets ALL moves of its own type, if any (leave the hyphens) (a Pokemon with no moves learns *Struggle*).
Pick a Pokemon. It forgets a random move (leave the hyphen) (a Pokemon with no moves learns *Struggle*).
Lower 1 or more Pokemon's level by any amount (can't go below 1). Give yourself $1 for each level lowered.
Set a Pokemon's held item to any gem (e.g. "*Ice Gem*").
Generate a random type, then set a Pokemon's held item to the gem of that type (e.g. "*Ice Gem*").
Set a Pokemon's held item to any gem (e.g. "*Ice Gem*") that DOES NOT correspond to the current type of any of its Physical/Special moves.
Set a Pokemon's held item to anything other than an Eviolite or a Z-Crystal.
Copy a Pokemon's held item to another Pokemon. Can't copy Eviolite.
Copy a Pokemon's held item to ALL other Pokemon.
Set a Pokemon's held item to any item you KNOW FOR SURE your opponent had last battle. Exception: Z-Crystals.

Set a Pokemon's held item to any Plate (e.g. "*Zap Plate*") that DOES NOT correspond to the current type of any of its Physical/Special moves.
Set a Pokemon's held item to any Z-Crystal.

Set a Pokemon's held item to any Z-Crystal that DOES NOT correspond to the current type of ANY of its moves.

Randomly pick an opposing Pokemon from LAST BATTLE. If you correctly name its held item (or lack thereof), earn $30.
Randomly pick an opposing Pokemon from LAST BATTLE. If you correctly name its ability, earn $30.
Randomly pick an opposing Pokemon from LAST BATTLE. If you correctly name its Tera Type, earn $30.
Randomly pick an opposing Pokemon from LAST BATTLE. If you correctly name ALL of its moves, earn $30.
Your opponent sends you a pic of a random Pokemon. If you correctly spell its name, earn $30.
Your opponent sends you a pic of a random Pokemon, then MAY LIE about its category name (e.g. "Mouse Pokemon"). If you correctly say true/false, earn $30.
Your opponent sends you a pic of a random Pokemon, then MAY LIE about an ability it can have. If you correctly say true/false, earn $30.
Your opponent sends you a pic of a random Pokemon. If you correctly name an ability it can have, earn $30.

Your opponent sends you a pic of a random Pokemon. If you correctly state its catch rate, earn $30.
Catch rate is a number 3-255, usually a multiple of 5.

Your opponent sends you a pic of a random Pokemon. If you correctly state one of its Egg Groups, earn $30.
Egg Groups: monster, water 1 (amphibious), water 2 (fish), water 3 (invertebrate), bug, flying, field, fairy, grass, human-like, mineral, amorphous, dragon, ditto, no eggs discovered.
Your opponent sends you a pic of a random Pokemon. If you correctly state its height rounded to the nearest foot, earn $30.

Your opponent sends you a pic of a random Pokemon. If you correctly state Low Kick's base power against it, earn $30.
20: 0.1 - 21.8 lb
40: 21.9 - 55.0 lb
60: 55.1 - 110.0 lb
80: 110.2 - 220.2 lb
100: 220.4 - 440.7 lb
120: 440.9 - 999.9 lb

Your opponent sends you a pic of a random Pokemon. If you correctly state its leveling rate, earn $30.
Leveling Rates: Erratic, Fast, Medium Fast, Medium Slow, Slow, Fluctuating.
Erratic and Fluctuating is mostly for gen 3 Pokemon.

Your opponent sends you a pic of a random Pokemon. If you correctly state its EV yield, earn $30.
Total 1-3 pts, sometimes split between different stats.
Your opponent sends you a pic of a random Pokemon. If you correctly state which stat is its highest, earn $30. (If there are multiple, you only need to state one of them.)

Your opponent sends you the NAME of a random Pokemon. If you can identify its Pokedex shape, earn $30.

Your opponent sends you the NAME of a random Pokemon. If you correctly state its Pokedex color, earn $30.
Colors: brown, red, yellow, green, blue, purple, pink, white, gray, black.
Your opponent sends you a pic of a random Pokemon, then MAY LIE about a move it can learn (in National Dex AG). If you correctly say true/false, earn $30.
Your opponent sends you a pic of a random Pokemon. If you correctly state the generation number it was introduced in, earn $30.
Your opponent sends you a pic of a random Pokemon. If you correctly spell the name of the Pokemon BEFORE IT in the Pokedex, earn $30.
Your opponent sends you a pic of a random Pokemon. If you correctly spell the name of the Pokemon AFTER IT in the Pokedex, earn $30.
Refreshing the shop now only costs $2.
+1 slot in the shop.
-1 slot in the shop.
Can now buy the same thing multiple times (doesn't work for Quizzes, Trivia, or earning money).
column15: since money/slots are worth more now than later, "$ saved" is halved

column14: Every round, +1 species option for your new Pokemon.

The new Pokemon you get every round is 1 level lower than normal (can't go below 1).
